sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The first shipment of US military aid arrives to Kiev amid surge intentions at the border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia sends planes to Belarus for joint exercises.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Friedrich Merz has been elected the new leader of the Christian Democrats, promising a new start to the German Conservatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Now on Opposition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Russia and Romania battle a surge in coronavirus cases. On Friday, both countries registered a record number of daily infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: U.S. military aircraft with little weapons have been arriving to Kiev.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken visited Ukraine this week, with President Biden promising 175 million euros in military aid to Ukraine this week, with President Biden promising 175 million euros in military aid to Ukraine amid soaring fears of an alleged Russian invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A Royal Air Force military aircraft also landed in Kiev this week following Britain's announcement that it would be supplying anti-tank weapons to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces have said they are ready for any eventual aggression from across the border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We have special reserves prepared for this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And this territory is equipped with surveillance cameras.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We will be able to see any early signs of an attack and then warn the armed forces who will send defensive support.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: warn the armed forces who will send defensive support. Russia has further upped the ante by announcing more military drills in the region, with footage released by the Russian military showing fighter jets being sent to neighboring Belarus, adding to an estimated 100,000 troops deployed near Ukraine's borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russian military units have moved to areas near the Belarusian southern border, a mere 75 kilometres away from Kiev.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Friedrich Merz has been elected the new leader of the Christian Democrats party in Germany.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At the federal party conference, held digitally, Merz got almost 95% of the votes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Now heading the biggest opposition party in the Bundestag, Merz will likely create challenges to the current coalition under Chancellor Olaf Scholz.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I accept this election result.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I am deeply moved by the result.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Many thanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Friedrich Merz has failed twice in taking the leadership of the party in the past. The first time after the withdrawal of Angela Merkel and the second one against Armin Laschet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Speaking ahead of the vote, Mr Merz said this party had experienced turbulent times over the past three years, but vowed to make his election a new start.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russia registered 49,513 new coronavirus cases on Friday. This is the highest daily number of infections recorded in the country since the pandemic began. Health authorities say the surge has been driven by the highly contagious omicron strain romania has also hit a new daily maximum of nearly 20 000 covet 19 cases while hospitalizations and deaths are significantly lower compared to the previous wave the vaccination uptake is the second lowest in the eu in poland prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki says the country has entered its fifth wave, while free antigen tests will now be provided in pharmacies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Moving East, Belgium broadcasted the introduction of a corona barometer from next Friday. The colour-coded system will determine what type of restrictions will be put in place against the number of patients in hospitals and ICU wards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And in a surprising move, Ireland's Taoiseach Micheál Martin declared that almost all COVID restrictions will be lifted from 6am on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The only rules that will remain in place will be face masks, self-isolation after positive test results and COVID passes for international travel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Finally, in Denmark, the BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron is taking hold, but so far there doesn't appear too much cause for concern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, there is a possibility it might be more transmissible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More than 28,000 migrants managed successfully to cross the English Channel in small boats illegally last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: That's according to the latest figures from the British Home Office, which says this figure is five times more than in 2020.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There were also 52,000 attempts in 2021 that were unsuccessful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: 36 people died, which includes those 27 in a shipwreck last November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, the total amount who were successful is a fraction of the total amount of more than 120,000 who entered Europe via the Mediterranean last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, many people still continue to jump onto lorries in France, hoping to reach the UK safely.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But this way is extremely dangerous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There have been deaths when people fall under the wheels of a truck.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And just last week, a Portuguese driver was punched when he tried to remove migrants from his truck and he died of a heart attack shortly afterwards. Drivers can be fined as much as 2,000 euros for smuggling people into Britain even if they don't know about anyone being on board. The situation has strained the relationship between France and Britain and after the November shipwreck French President Emmanuel Macron appealed for more European cooperation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, around 1,000 people have already crossed in January of this year to the UK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Home Secretary Priti Patel has put forward a controversial pushback policy and has commissioned the Ministry of Defence as a crucial operational partner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But the Royal Navy is reported to say they're trained to save lives rather than push back anyone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: to say they're trained to save lives rather than push back anyone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: New Hope is the name of this tailor shop at the heart of Caserta, south of Italy, where eight women of different origin and backgrounds work together to give themselves the chance of being independent and live their lives freely. It started almost 20 years ago as a way to give migrant women, mainly of African origin, the chance to set free from the legacy of human trafficking and start a new life. Thanks to an order of a thousand bags from the regional administration in 2004, we had the strength and courage to invest what we'd earned in order to give the girls the possibility to keep dreaming through this tailor shop today this tailor shop has opened its doors to all women who want to take control of their own lives they've put their past behind them what matters now is what they do here now people that's here everything they are doing take all of them talk about something there's a message send it to other people there's hope there's a like experience many things they are trying to explain to people from the darkness of the past to the colors of a new life for these women this fabric is not only a way of earning their living but it also represents a tangible sign of their liberation from oppressive conditions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We want to be an example.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Women are strong enough to pursue their dreams, to be the protagonist of their own life and their family life, not only as mothers and wives, but also as independent women with their own job.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Each product in this shop tells the story of a woman who believes in the chance of starting a new life, whether they are migrants or Italians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I chose to resign from the marketing agency I was working for and came here to work in this cooperative.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I made this choice with my heart because it's nice to see the smiles back on these women's faces when they can take their lives back through their work a story behind each product quality and beauty reflecting the dignity of work this is the new hope taylor's shop luca palamara for euronews, Caserta. passion and suffering, influencing prominent people such as Oprah Winfrey while dedicating his life to the spread of peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The cities of Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo in Brazil are postponing the glittering parades

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: that are the highlight of carnival festivities due to a surge in coronavirus infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The processions have been rescheduled for April.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The pandemic has killed more than 622,000 people in Brazil and the country is in the middle of yet another wave fueled by the Omicron variant of the virus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It looks pretty but might not be everyone's cup of tea. The first underground swimming relay was held in Poland at the historic silver mine in Taranowski Gory. It's on the UNESCO World Heritage list.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The brave participants seem to love it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: People who swim open water know what it means.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This water is soft, you can feel it with the whole body.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The experience is almost spiritual. It's fantastic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: 300 winter swimmers took part in the event, which saw them swim through a 600-metre-long rock corridor, 30 metres underground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: One of them says his experience of swimming across the dangerous English Channel helped him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's amazing. I would recommend it to anyone who would like to cross the English Channel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I would recommend trying to swim in this darkness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I also started crossing the channel around midnight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Such training will be useful to everyone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: After the exhilarating encounter with water of around 6 degrees Celsius, the swimmers could put their layers back on to warm up.
